org.hibernate.search.annotations
Annotation Type IndexedEmbedded

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value={FIELD,METHOD})
@Documented
public @interface IndexedEmbedded

Optional Element Summary
 int depth
          Stop indexing embedded elements when depth is reached depth=1 means the associated element is index, but not its embedded elements Default: infinite (an exception will be raised in case of class circular reference when infinite is chosen)
 String prefix
          Field name prefix Default to 'propertyname.'
 Class targetElement
          Overrides the type of an association.
 

prefix

public abstract String prefix
Field name prefix Default to 'propertyname.'

Default:
"."

depth

public abstract int depth
Stop indexing embedded elements when depth is reached depth=1 means the associated element is index, but not its embedded elements Default: infinite (an exception will be raised in case of class circular reference when infinite is chosen)

Default:
2147483647

targetElement

public abstract Class targetElement
Overrides the type of an association. If a collection, overrides the type of the collection generics

Default:
void.class
